original: Knuckles: We have to survive for 3 minutes until Sonic gets here!
zh_trans: 纳克鲁斯：我们必须存活 180 秒，直到索尼克降临！

original: Knuckles: We gotta find the chaos emerald shards!
zh_trans: 纳克鲁斯：我们得找到混沌翡翠碎片！

original: Knuckles: We only have 30 seconds until the zombie's nukes blow, hurry!
zh_trans: 纳克鲁斯：距僵尸的核弹爆炸只剩 30 秒的时间了，快点！

original: Knuckles: Okay, nice work! We have to kill the rest of Eggman's zombies before their internal nuke blows!
zh_trans: 纳克鲁斯：好，干得不错！我们必须在艾格曼的那些僵尸体内的核弹爆炸之前，把剩下的僵尸都杀掉！
